result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status Conference on December 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on November 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Attorney Kuczynski advised defendant waives reading of information and enters NG pleas. PTC/STC set. Bond cont.

ADA Diaz appears in person for the State. Defendant appears in person with Atty Kuczynski. State calls witness Arcadia PD Officer I.Garcia, sworn in. State examines witness. Defense examines witness. No additional questions or witnesses from either party. State moves for bind over. Court finds probable cause. Defendant is BOT. State will file an information. PTC and STC set. Atty advised Defendant waives reading of information and enters NG plea. Bond Cont.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection

10:47 AM Defendant Marcelino Ortiz Garcia in court.  Prosecuting attorney Micabil Diaz-Martinez in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Kuczynski  appears by video. Interpreter F.F. appears by video, sworn in. Court advised defendant of rights/max penalties. Defendant waives reading of complaint. PH set. Bond cont.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

11:31 AM Defendant Marcelino Ortiz Garcia in court.  Prosecuting attorney Micabil Diaz-Martinez in court for the State of Wisconsin. Interpreter S.R. appears in person, sworn in. Defendant updates address. Defendant has contacted SPD office, no answer. Defendant unable to hire own attorney but should be able to get counsel now that is working. AIA set. Bond cont.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
